page.title: 12Living in Frimley Green
page.content: Situated close to the M3 motorway, {Frimley Green}is easily reached from London, Heathrow and Gatwick Airports and seaports like Southampton. The volume of traffic through the village is continually increasing so that there is often congestion on the roads which are narrow. The one bus service in{Frimley Green runs every two hours, between Aldershot and Camberley. The nearest railway stations are Farnborough and Frimley. There are quite a few small shops in the village, as well as a bank, post office and building society, so all basic needs are satisfied. People with cars tend to travel to nearby large towns for shopping but the local shopkeepers cater well for the elderly in particular.
